Kosgei meriri n'ọsọ mita 10,000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2002 Commonwealth Games
Oge ya, 31:27.83, bụ ndekọ egwuregwu Commonwealth ọhụrụ (ka na-arụ ọrụ mgbe egwuregwu afọ 2010 gasịrị).
O sonyere na afọ 2003 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na Vilamoura, Spain, mana ọ gwụbeghị karịa nke 41
Kosgei sonyeere Kenya na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na marathon, na-emecha nke iri.

N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel, ọ meriri na afo 2009 Boston Marathon oge 2:32:16, nke abụọ n'ihu Dire Tune nke Ethiopia. Ọ gbalịrị ịgbachitere aha ya n'asọmpi nke afọ na-esote mana nsọpụrụ ahụ gara Teyba Erkesso ebe Kosgei mechara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
O nwere agbụrụ marathon abụọ ọzọ na afọ 2009, na-abịa nke atọ na Grottazzolina Marathon na nke iri na ise na afo 2010 New York City Marathon
O nwetakwara mmeri na Florence Half Marathon.
N'afọ 2011, ọ nọ n'elu iri na Lisbon Half Marathon, Portugal Half Marathon na Yokohama Women's Marathon
Ihe kacha mma ọ rụzuru n'afọ ahụ bụ ọsọ nke 2:32:06 awa maka nke ise na San Diego Marathon
O sonyeghị na asọmpi na 2012 ma pụta naanị ugboro abụọ na afọ 2013, na-abịa nke anọ na Stockholm Marathon ma merie Marathon des Alpes-Maritimes
Ọ lụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ Barnabas Kinyor
Ha nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị, Billy na Ruth, amụrụ na 1996 na afọ 2001, n'otu n'otu.
